column1: '''''Sotheby's English Literature, History, Children's Books, Illustrations and Photographs 8 July 2004''''' is an auction catalogue from [[Sotheby's]] (London). The catalogue includes several [[J.R.R. Tolkien
column2: Tolkien]]-related lots, the most notable being:

column1: *379 (p. 232) - This lot consists of [[Letters to Dorothy Wood
column2: twelve letters from Tolkien to Dorothy "Ding" Wood]], dating from 1960 to 1973. The lot description includes extracts from many of the letters. The lot also includes letters from [[Edith Tolkien

column1: *381 (p. 234) - A proof copy of ''[[The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' dating from [[1953]]. The lot description quotes an earlier version of the Ring verse ("...and in the shadow bind them") and goes on to record a number of differences between the proof copy and the published book. The title page is reproduced in a photograph.<ref>{{webcite

*383 (p. 236) - The lot consists of copies of the first authorized paperback edition of ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' (published by [[Ballantine Books]]), from the library of J.R.R. Tolkien. The lot description briefly describes Tolkien's annotations in the books, and quotes a key written by Tolkien.
